Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Bianca, please?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Karenina, that's impossible right now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'So, please stop asking.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'What are you talking about?', 3: '10'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "It's nothing. I've got other matters to attend to. I'm gonna get going.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Our conversation here is over. Do as you please, Commandant.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I knew you were dying to ask!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Only if you want to tell me.', 3: '17', 4: "What's wrong?", 5: '18'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I don't wanna just come out and say it!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Nothing's wrong.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "But I hate keeping secrets. I'll feel better if I just get it off my chest.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'We members of the Engineering Force work closely with the Purifying Force. We often encounter Corrupted and Constructs damaged beyond repair...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "And I just can't...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "What if the Gray Ravens become our target one day? What if I'm ordered to kill you guys?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I don't want my creations to be used against... Grr! Stupid emotions!", 4: '1'}
{2: "That's why you're avoiding me.", 3: '25', 4: "That won't happen to us.", 5: '26'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Yeah... That's why! So what?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Who's to say?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I made a promise to someone that I'd treasure everyone's life...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I always dream that the lives of the Corrupted will be saved... Dammit...', 4: '1'}
